mapper.select: SELECT ps.id, ps.user_id, ps.post_id, ps.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, p.title as post_title, LEFT(p.content, 100) as post_content FROM post_stars ps INNER JOIN users u ON ps.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN posts p ON ps.post_id = p.id WHERE ps.post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY ps.created_at DESC
